stepOne.title: Step One
stepOne.description: Edit Dashboard/index.tsx to change this screen and then come back to see your edits.

nativeBase.title: Shopify/restyle
nativeBase.description: Shopify/restyle is a library used for styling in many React applications. For the toast notifications Burnt is used, a small package that uses Native code to display toasts.

navigation.title: Expo Router
navigation.description: Expo Router is a navigation library widely used in Expo applications. It provides an excellent starting point for Expo development.

learnMore.title: Learn More
learnMore.description: Read the docs to discover what to do next.

toastDemo.title: OMG A TOAST!
toastDemo.description: One of the many NativeBase features.
